name: Consumer RabbitMQ
xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="{{protocol}}://{{hostname}}:{{port}}/{{exchange}}{{querystring query_params prefetch_params exchange_declare extra_query_params}}"/>
    {{#if (eq out_format "json")}}
    <unmarshal>
        <json/>
    </unmarshal>
    {{/if}}
    <multicast>
        {{#each target}}
        <to uri="direct:{{this}}"/>
            {{/each}}
    </multicast>
</route>
